member.name: T:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient
member.summary: A client for the GitLab API v4. You can read more about the api here: https://docs.gitlab.com/ce/api/README.html.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the GitLab API v4 client pointing to the specified hostUrl.
member.param: Host address of GitLab instance. For example https://gitlab.example.com or https://gitlab.example.com/api/v4/
Personal access token. Obtained from GitLab profile settings.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.SimpleQuery
member.summary: 一些简单的查询可直接在此定义

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.MileStone
member.summary: Access GitLab's mileStone API.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.Issues
member.summary: Access GitLab's issues API.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.MergeRequests
member.summary: Access GitLab's merge requests API.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.Projects
member.summary: Access GitLab's projects API.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.Users
member.summary: Access GitLab's users API.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.Groups
member.summary: Access GitLab's groups API.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.HostUrl
member.summary: Host address of GitLab instance. For example https://gitlab.example.com or https://gitlab.example.com/api/v4/.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GitLabClient.LoginAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates with GitLab API using user credentials.

member.name: T:GitLabApiClient.GitLabException
member.summary: Exception thrown when GitLab returns non success status code.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.GitLabException.HttpStatusCode
member.summary: Http status code of GitLab response.

member.name: T:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient
member.summary: Used to query GitLab API to retrieve, modify, create groups. Thrown if request to GitLab API does not indicate success Thrown if request to GitLab API fails

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.GetAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get all details of a group. This endpoint can be accessed without authentication if the group is publicly accessible.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.SearchAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get all groups that match your string in their name or path.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.GetAsync(System.Action{GitLabApiClient.Models.Groups.Requests.GroupsQueryOptions})
member.summary: Get a list of visible groups for the authenticated user. When accessed without authentication, only public groups are returned.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.GetProjectsAsync(System.String,System.Action{GitLabApiClient.Models.Groups.Requests.ProjectsGroupQueryOptions})
member.summary: Get a list of projects in this group.. When accessed without authentication, only public projects are returned..
member.param: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.CreateAsync(GitLabApiClient.Models.Groups.Requests.CreateGroupRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new project group. Available only for users who can create groups.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.TransferAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Transfer a project to the Group namespace. Available only for admin
member.param: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user.
The ID or path of a project.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.UpdateAsync(GitLabApiClient.Models.Groups.Requests.UpdateGroupRequest)
member.summary: Updates the project group. Only available to group owners and administrators.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.DeleteAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Removes group with all projects inside. Only available to group owners and administrators.
member.param: The ID or path of a user group.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.SyncLdapAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Syncs the group with its linked LDAP group. Only available to group owners and administrators.
member.param: The ID or path of a user group.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.CreateLdapLinkAsync(GitLabApiClient.Models.Groups.Requests.CreateLdapGroupLinkRequest)
member.summary: Creates LDAP group link.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.DeleteLdapLinkAsync(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a LDAP group link.
member.param: The CN of a LDAP group

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.GroupsClient.DeleteProviderLdapLinkAsync(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a LDAP group link for a specific LDAP provider.
member.param: The CN of a LDAP group

member.name: T:GitLabApiClient.IssuesClient
member.summary: Used to query GitLab API to retrieve, modify, create issues. Every call to issues API must be authenticated. Thrown if request to GitLab API does not indicate success Thrown if request to GitLab API fails

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.IssuesClient.GetAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves project issue.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.IssuesClient.GetAsync(System.String,System.Action{GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.ProjectIssuesQueryOptions})
member.summary: Retrieves issues from a project. By default retrieves opened issues from all users.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.IssuesClient.GetAsync(System.Action{GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions})
member.summary: Retrieves issues from all projects. By default retrieves opened issues from all users.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.IssuesClient.CreateAsync(GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.CreateIssueRequest)
member.summary: Creates new issue.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.IssuesClient.UpdateAsync(GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.UpdateIssueRequest)
member.summary: Updated existing issue.

member.name: T:GitLabApiClient.MergeRequestsClient
member.summary: Used to query GitLab API to retrieve, modify, accept, create merge requests. Every API call to merge requests must be authenticated. Thrown if request to GitLab API does not indicate success Thrown if request to GitLab API fails

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.MergeRequestsClient.GetAsync(System.Int32,System.Action{GitLabApiClient.Models.MergeRequests.Requests.ProjectMergeRequestsQueryOptions})
member.summary: Retrieves merge request from a project. By default returns opened merged requests created by anyone.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.MergeRequestsClient.GetAsync(System.Action{GitLabApiClient.Models.MergeRequests.Requests.MergeRequestsQueryOptions})
member.summary: Retrieves merge request from all projects the authenticated user has access to. By default returns opened merged requests created by anyone.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.MergeRequestsClient.CreateAsync(GitLabApiClient.Models.MergeRequests.Requests.CreateMergeRequest)
member.summary: Creates merge request.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.MergeRequestsClient.UpdateAsync(GitLabApiClient.Models.MergeRequests.Requests.UpdateMergeRequest)
member.summary: Updates merge request.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.MergeRequestsClient.AcceptAsync(GitLabApiClient.Models.MergeRequests.Requests.AcceptMergeRequest)
member.summary: Accepts merge request.

member.name: M:GitLabApiClient.MergeRequestsClient.DeleteAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes merge request.

member.summary: Used to create a new project group. Available only for users who can create groups.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: The group's description

member.summary: Prevent adding new members to project membership within this group

member.summary: Prevent sharing a project with another group within this group

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Groups.Requests.CreateGroupRequest.Visibility
member.summary: The group's visibility. Can be private, internal, or public.

member.summary: Enable/disable Large File Storage (LFS) for the projects in this group

member.summary: Allow users to request member access.

member.summary: The parent group id for creating nested group.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Groups.Requests.CreateGroupRequest.SharedRunnersMinutesLimit
member.summary: Pipeline minutes quota for this group

member.summary: Used to create Ldap link requests to a group.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

LDAP provider for the LDAP group (when using several providers).

member.summary: Return list of authorized groups matching the search criteria

member.summary: Order groups by name or path. Default is name

member.summary: Order groups in asc or desc order. Default is asc

member.summary: Include group statistics (admins only)

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Groups.Requests.GroupsQueryOptions.Owned

member.summary: Limit by archived status

member.summary: Limit by visibility public, internal, or private

member.summary: Return projects sorted in asc or desc order. Default is desc

member.summary: Return list of authorized projects matching the search criteria

member.summary: Limit by projects owned by the current user

member.summary: The description of an issue.

member.summary: Set an issue to be confidential. Default is false.

member.summary: The IDs of the users to assign issue.

member.summary: The ID of a milestone to assign issue.

member.summary: Label names for an issue.

member.summary: Date time string in the format YEAR-MONTH-DAY, e.g. 2016-03-11.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.CreateIssueRequest.CreatedAt
member.summary: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, e.g. 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires admin or project owner rights).

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.CreateIssueRequest.MergeRequestIdToResolveDiscussions
member.summary: The IID of a merge request in which to resolve all issues. This will fill the issue with a default description and mark all discussions as resolved. When passing a description or title, these values will take precedence over the default values.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.CreateIssueRequest.DiscussionToResolveId
member.summary: The ID of a discussion to resolve. This will fill in the issue with a default description and mark the discussion as resolved. Use in combination with

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.CreateIssueRequest.Weight
member.summary: The weight of an issue. Valid values are greater than or equal to 0.

member.name: T:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions
member.summary: Options for issues listing

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.State
member.summary: Return all issues or just those that are opened or closed. Default is Opened.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.Labels
member.summary: List of label names, issues must have all labels to be returned. No+Label lists all issues with no labels.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.MilestoneTitle
member.summary: The milestone title.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.Scope
member.summary: Return issues for the given scope. Defaults to issues created by anyone. (Introduced in GitLab 9.5).

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.AuthorId
member.summary: Return issues created by the given user id.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.AssigneeId
member.summary: Return issues assigned to the given user id (Introduced in GitLab 9.5).

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.IssueIds
member.summary: Return only the issues having the given iid.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.Order
member.summary: Specifies issues order. Default is Creation time.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.SortOrder
member.summary: Specifies project sort order. Default is desending.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.IssuesQueryOptions.Filter
member.summary: Search issues against their title and description

member.summary: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

member.summary: Return issues created after the given time (inclusive)

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.Issues.Requests.ProjectIssuesQueryOptions.CreatedBefore

member.summary: The milestone title.

member.name: P:GitLabApiClient.Models.MergeRequests.Requests.MergeRequestsQueryOptions.Labels
